AG.name: Xenoblade Chronicles™ X
AG.description: Earth has fallen. Yet mankind endures, taking to the stars and crash-landing on an alien world in a desperate attempt to escape. Defend the survivors using high-tech weaponry on a mission to rebuild humanity. Suit up in heavily armed mechs to tame the wilds of planet Mira and beat back the hostile forces threatening to obliterate the human race. All of civilization faces annihilation from an intergalactic war between two alien races. Battle powerful creatures using a real-time combat system that is filled with tactical options. Tailor your character and mech to showcase your individuality and strength. Then equip them with customized weapons to dominate real-time battles. Conquer a huge world, and forge new friendships with alien beings. Stand together or fall. Humanity’s fate rests, like a sword, in your hand. The Xenoblade Chronicles X game can only be purchased as a digital download in the U.S., Canada and Mexico. Availability of the game in packaged form varies by country. DLC is only usable when added to the full version of the game.

Tailor your character and mech to showcase your individuality and strength. Then equip them with customized weapons to dominate real-time battles. Conquer a huge world, and forge new friendships with alien beings. Stand together or fall. Humanity’s fate rests, like a sword, in your hand. The Xenoblade Chronicles X game can only be purchased as a digital download in the U.S., Canada and Mexico. Availability of the game in packaged form varies by country. DLC is only usable when added to the full version of the game.

MX.name: Xenoblade Chronicles™ X
MX.description: La tierra se ha desplomado, pero la humanidad sigue en pie. Los sobrevivientes han abandonado la tierra y se encuentran en un planeta desconocido. Tu misión es construir un futuro para la humanidad. Equípate con poderosas armas, sobrevive los peligros del planeta Mira y derrota a los mortíferos enemigos que amenazan con exterminar a la raza humana. La civilización entera se encuentra ante la aniquilación derivada de una guerra intergaláctica de dos razas alienígenas. Deberás enfrentarte a poderosas especies en un sistema de combate de tiempo real con numerosas opciones tácticas. Perfecciona tu personaje y equipo para demostrar tu imponente fortaleza. Equípate con armas personalizadas y toma el dominio en batallas de tiempo real. Conquista un vasto mundo y genera alianzas con los alienígenas, para sobrevivir necesitarán unirse. El destino de la humanidad está en tus manos. La versión digital descargable del juego Xenoblade Chronicles X solo puede ser adquirida en Estados Unidos, Canadá y México. La disponibilidad del juego en su versión física varía dentro de cada país. El contenido descargable solo puede ser utilizado en conjunto con la versión completa del juego.

PY.name: Xenoblade Chronicles™ X
PY.description: Earth has fallen. Yet mankind endures, taking to the stars and crash-landing on an alien world in a desperate attempt to escape. Defend the survivors using high-tech weaponry on a mission to rebuild humanity. Suit up in heavily armed mechs to tame the wilds of planet Mira and beat back the hostile forces threatening to obliterate the human race. All of civilization faces annihilation from an intergalactic war between two alien races. Battle powerful creatures using a real-time combat system that is filled with tactical options. The Xenoblade Chronicles X game can only be purchased as a digital download in the U.S., Canada and Mexico. Availability of the game in packaged form varies by country. DLC is only usable when added to the full version of the game.
